title: Smart Recommendations for Renting Bikes in Bike Sharing Systems. (arXiv:2401.12322v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Vehicle-sharing systems -- such as bike-, car-, or motorcycle-sharing systems -- have become increasingly popular in big cities in recent years. On the one hand, they provide a cheaper and environmentally friendlier means of transportation than private cars, and on the other hand, they satisfy the individual mobility demands of citizens better than traditional public transport systems. One of their advantages in this regard is their availability, e.g., the possibility of taking (or leaving) a vehicle almost anywhere in a city. This availability obviously depends on different strategic and operational management decisions and policies, such as the dimension of the fleet or the (re)distribution of vehicles. translated_title: 在共享单车系统中的租车智能推荐
translated_abstract: 近年来，车辆共享系统（如自行车、汽车或摩托车共享系统）在大城市中越来越受欢迎。一方面，它们提供了比私人汽车更便宜和环保的交通方式，另一方面，它们满足了市民个体化的出行需求，比传统的公共交通系统更好。其中一个优势是可用性，比如在城市中几乎可以随处（还）车。这种可用性显然取决于不同的战略和运营管理决策和政策，如车队规模或车辆（再）分配。在这种系统中，由于使用模式，可用车辆集中在某些地区，而其他地区没有车辆的问题非常常见，需要解决。研究一直致力于解决这个问题，更具体地指明了不同的策略和方法。
tldr: 这项研究主要关注共享单车系统中的租车智能推荐问题，旨在解决车辆可用性不均衡的挑战。
en_tdlr: This research focuses on the problem of smart recommendations for renting bikes in bike sharing systems, aiming to address the challenge of uneven vehicle availability.
